MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Rodel Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.54am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair we now require further investigations on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.02pm on Monday 15th February 2021.
